story: In the depths of the ancient forest, where the trees whispered secrets of old, a young knight stumbled upon a crystal-clear pond that mirrored the stars above, even under the sun. Guided by legends, he drank the water, hoping to gain the strength to defeat the dragon terrorizing his homeland. As his body filled with a newfound power, the pond revealed its true guardian, a fae, who offered wisdom far beyond mere strength to ensure victory and peace.
